title: Pulling No Punches
description:
Pulling No Punches is a satirical game in the 2D beat’em up style with classic arcade influences and modern visuals. The game follows the fictional story of a global pandemic that engulfed the world and is being ignored by fanatics who do not believe that the disease is real. It is up to the main characters, 4 common citizens adequately protected with gloves and masks, to deal with these fanatics and solve the situation with the force of their own fists .
If you love the “beat’em up” genre, then here you have to, armed with masks, gloves and your fists, beat the inhabitants of the city who do not believe in a pandemic. The game supports co-op on one computer up to 4 people. So call your friends and go to the streets of the city to stop the madmen who spread the infection. Arcade Paradise
